Codecast

This project is a complete revamp and amelioration of the Codecast platform. This was a 3 months long project part of my Master of Computer Science degree at Institut Polytechnique de Paris. Including myself, 2 designers were in charge of the project. We both equally managed the UX and UI side of the project, which included some of the following task:

  • Research
  • Understanding & analyzing the user needs
  • User interviews and observations
  • Ideating
  • Wireframing & prototyping (low & high fidelity)
  • usability teting
  • Project presentation with stakeholders and PMs

What is Codecast?

How to overcome the barrier that a programming screencast video tutorial is not interactive? How to better teach and explain to learners basics of computer programming such as pointers, memory allocation or matrices in an online environment at large scale?
Any computer science educator has to explain sooner or later a portion of code or a structured text to learners. The Codecast tool has been specially designed by computer science educators and developed for MOOCs to replace non-interactive screencasts.
